messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright we uh got a message saying there's Syndicate activity. Uh. Syndicate agents - give us your contraband and you will not be hurt.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Syndicate do some exciting shit or fuck off!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning, It seems that someone has snuck aboard the cargo shuttle, We are not completely sure why but be cautious.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Crew we have been able to find that there were two biosignatures on that ship when it left. That is all we've got

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Crew of Space Station 13, We have reason to believe that there are still syndicate agents aboard your ship. Find them ASAP!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We think that's all of them crew, Frome here on out it should be smooth sailing!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
